properties.description: Pipeline to move Artisan Data to the Artisan SQL Server

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	P.PRO_CODE AS profile_code
	,P.PRODESC AS profile_description
	,CONTACT.CONTACT_REF AS oCnta_Det_Ref
	,CONCAT(RTRIM(CONTACT.FORENAMES), RTRIM(CONTACT.SURNAME)) AS FundSourceName	
FROM 
	FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_HD AS CALENDAR
		ON CALENDAR.CAL_REF = ACC.CAL_REF
		
	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R
		ON R.RES_REF = ACC.RES_REF

	LEFT JOIN Room_Dt AS Rooms
		ON Rooms.Room_Ref = R.Room_Ref
WHERE
	P.FSTYPE = 401
	--AND R.STATUS IN (25028, 25029)
	AND Rooms.LOC_REF IN (
		112,
		113,
		114,
		115,
		117,
		122,
		123,
		124,
		125,
		134,
		138,
		139,
		140,
		141,
		142,
		145,
		146,
		147,
		148,
		149,
		150,
		151,
		152,
		153,
		154,
		155,
		156,
		157,
		158,
		159,
		160,
		161,
		162,
		163,
		164,
		165,
		166,
		167,
		168,
		169,
		170,
		171,
		172,
		173,
		180,
		181
		)

properties.description: Downloads data from Broadshields API each evening @ 11:45
Uses the daily Json files from Broadshield API to update the Current table with an Upsert operation. And add new/updated records to the History tables.

activities.name: Update Current data
activities.description: Upserts data from the JSON files to the current tables

activities.name: Create History records
activities.description: Inserts any new or updated records into the history tables.

properties.description: Transfers the allocation data from CH to Transform_DB

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
	Allocations.[AL_DET_REF]
	,Allocations.[AL_ACCOUNT] AS AccNo
	,Allocations.[AL_CREDATT] AS CreatedAt
	,Allocations.[AL_DATE] AS TransactionDate
	,Allocations.[AL_PAYDAY] AS DateAllocated
	,Allocations.[AL_PAYIND]
	,Allocations.[AL_POSTREF] AS POST_REF
	,Allocations.[AL_REF1] AS Reference1
	,Allocations.[AL_REF2] AS Reference2
	,Allocations.[AL_TYPE] 
	,CASE 
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'A' THEN 'Adjustment - System'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment - User'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'R' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN Allocations.[AL_TYPE] = 'N' THEN 'Adjustment - System'
		ELSE ''
	END AS TransactionType
	,Allocations.[AL_VAL] AS AllocationValue
	,Allocations.[MEMO] AS AllocationMemo
FROM 
	InvAlloc AS Allocations WITH (NOLOCK)

SELECT	 
	Nominal_Code.AltAccount AS AnalysisCode, 
	Nominal_Code.Description AS AnalysisDescription, 
	Nominal_Code.Account
FROM		 
	Nominal_Code (NOLOCK) 
WHERE	 
	Nominal_Code.RecType = 'Elephant' 
	AND Nominal_Code.UseFlag <> 'X' 
	AND Nominal_Code.AltAccount != ''
	AND (SiteFilter = 0 OR Noml_Ref IN (SELECT LinkKey FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK) WHERE upper(LinkTable) = 'NOMINAL_CODE' AND Site_Ref = 151)) ORDER BY Nominal_Code.Account

SELECT 
    Site.SiteId
	,Site.SiteName
	,Profiles.Pro_code AS profile_code
    ,Profiles.Prodesc AS profile_description
    ,Chsysdec.Description AS account_type
    ,Profiles.Pro_ref
    ,Profiles.Billdays AS bill_days_or_nights
    ,Profiles.Billdeath AS bill_day_of_death
    ,Profiles.Billdod AS bill_day_of_discharge
    ,Profiles.Billdoa AS bill_day_of_admission
    ,Profiles.Invprint
    ,Profiles.Invdoc
    ,Profiles.Soflag AS standing_order
    ,Profiles.Noticeper AS notice_period
    ,Profiles.Nperanal AS notice_period_analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Npervatr AS notice_period_vat_code
    ,Profiles.Defrate AS default_charge_rate
    ,Profiles.Chgper AS charge_period
    ,Profiles.Feesanal AS analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Feesdesc AS fees_description
    ,Profiles.FeesVatC AS vat_code
    ,Profiles.BillAbs AS bill_while_temp_absent
    ,Profiles.Autocredit AS automatic_credit
    ,Profiles.PenBooks AS attach_pension_books
    ,Profiles.UserMemo
    ,Profiles.NoInvDec
    ,Profiles.sg_BankAcc
    ,Profiles.UseFlag
    ,Profiles.OOSExtraContrib

FROM 
	Profiles (NOLOCK)

    JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK) -- Lookup table for values?
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Profiles.FsType

    JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Profiles.Pro_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'PROFILES'
                            )
           OR Profiles.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Profiles.FSTYPE = 401 --Local Auth
	--AND Site.SITEID IN (
	--071,
--072,
--073,
--074,
--075,
--078,
--079,
--086,
--089,
--088,
--091,
--092,
--090,
--095,
--096,
--097,
--098,
--099,
--100,
--101,
--102,
--103,
--104,
--105,
--106,
--107,
--108,
--109,
--110,
--111,
--112,
--113,
--114,
--115,
--116,
--117,
--118,
--119,
--120,
--121,
--122,
--123,
--127,
--128
--)

SELECT 
    H.Home_Ref
    --,P.SiteId
    ,SiteName
    ,profile_code
    ,profile_description
    ,account_type
    ,Pro_ref
    ,bill_days_or_nights
    ,bill_day_of_death
    ,bill_day_of_discharge
    ,bill_day_of_admission
    --,Invprint
    --,Invdoc
    ,standing_order
    ,notice_period
    ,notice_period_analysis_code
    ,notice_period_vat_code
    ,default_charge_rate
    ,charge_period
    ,analysis_code
    ,fees_description
    ,vat_code
    ,bill_while_temp_absent
    ,automatic_credit
    ,attach_pension_books
    --,UserMemo
    --,NoInvDec
    ,sg_BankAcc
    --,UseFlag
    --,OOSExtraContrib
FROM 
    dbo.LocalAuthProfiles AS P

    LEFT JOIN ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = P.SiteId

SELECT
	DIRECTD_DT.DDDT_REF,
	DirectD_Hd.DDHD_REF,
	FundSrc_Hd.AccNo,
    Resident.Res_Code,
	DirectD_DT.INVOICE_NO AS InvoiceNo,
    DirectD_Dt.DDTranType AS DDTypeID,
	CASE 
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 1 THEN 'New DD'
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 17 THEN 'Standard DD'
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 18 THEN 'Cancel DD'
		WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = 19 THEN 'Change of value'
		ELSE ''
	END AS DDTranType,
    DirectD_Dt.Amount AS DDAmount,
    isnull(DirectD_Dt.Due_Date, DirectD_Dt.Inv_Date) AS DueDate,
    DirectD_Dt.Submitted AS SubmittedDate,
    DirectD_Dt.Allocated AS AllocationStatus,
    DirectD_Hd.BatchNo,
	S.SITEID
FROM 
	DirectD_Dt (NOLOCK)
    
    JOIN DirectD_Hd (NOLOCK)
        ON DirectD_Hd.DDHd_Ref = DirectD_Dt.DDHd_Ref

    JOIN FundSrc_Hd (NOLOCK)
		ON FundSrc_Hd.FS_Ref = DirectD_Dt.FS_Ref

	JOIN Resident (NOLOCK)
		ON Resident.Res_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Res_Ref
		
	JOIN Site AS S(NOLOCK)
        ON S.Site_Ref = DIRECTD_HD.Site_Ref

SELECT
    DD.[SITEID]
    ,H.HOME_REF
    ,H.HomeName
    ,DD.DDDT_REF
    ,DD.[DDHD_REF]
    ,DD.[AccNo]
    ,DD.[RES_CODE]
    ,DD.[InvoiceNo]
    ,DD.[DDTypeID]
    ,DD.[DDTranType]
    ,DD.[DDAmount]
    ,DD.[DueDate]
    ,DD.[SubmittedDate]
    ,DD.[AllocationStatus]
    ,DD.[BatchNo]
FROM 
    ColdHarbour.STGDirectDebits AS DD

    LEFT JOIN GRG.HOME AS H
        ON H.SiteID = DD.SiteID

properties.description: Copies the posted transactions from On Prem CH to Transform

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	InvPosting.POST_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	P.PRODESC AS AccProfile,
	CONCAT(RTRIM(CONTACT.FORENAMES), RTRIM(CONTACT.SURNAME)) AS FundSourceName,
	InvPosting.account_No AS AccNo, 
	R.RES_CODE AS RES_CODE,
	InvPosting.CRE_DATET AS CreatedAt,
	InvPosting.DUE_DATE AS DueDate,
	InvPosting.INV_DATE AS TransactionDate,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt - To account'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'R' THEN 'Receipt - To transaction'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'N' THEN 'System Receipt'
		ELSE ''
	END AS TransactionType,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS Reference1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS Reference2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS TransactionValue, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS TransactionBalance
	,INVPOSTING.TRAN_TYPE
	,INVPOSTING.AN_CODE1 AS AnalysisCode
	,INVPOSTING.USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM 
	InvPosting WITH (NOLOCK)
	
	LEFT JOIN FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON ACC.ACCNO = InvPosting.ACCOUNT_NO
		AND ACC.ENDDATE IS NULL

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT WITH (NOLOCK) 
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON R.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF

	LEFT JOIN Site WITH (NOLOCK)
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

SELECT
    STGPostedTransactions.POST_REF
    ,STGPostedTransactions.SiteID
    ,HOME.HOME_REF
    ,STGPostedTransactions.SiteName
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AccProfile
    ,STGPostedTransactions.FundSourceName
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AccNo
    ,STGPostedTransactions.RES_CODE
    ,STGPostedTransactions.CreatedAt
    ,STGPostedTransactions.DueDate
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionDate
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionType
    ,STGPostedTransactions.Reference1
    ,STGPostedTransactions.Reference2
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionValue
    ,STGPostedTransactions.TransactionBalance
    ,STGPostedTransactions.AnalysisCode
    ,STGPostedTransactions.UserComment
FROM 
    ColdHarbour.STGPostedTransactions

    LEFT JOIN GRG.HOME
        ON HOME.SiteID = STGPostedTransactions.SiteID

properties.description: Runs pipelines to copy files from file share, then process them into SQL tables.
Copies the Parquet files from the Azure file share to Azure blob storage. Then copies data from the files and loads into the TRANSFROM_DB. Everyday at 3pm

activities.description: Download the zipped bak files from FTP

Download bak files from FTP Failure

properties.description: Exports the DD report for the 3 homes that bank with Barclays. Saves to container which is monitored by a logic app, which will save to share point.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
WITH DirectDebitData AS (
	SELECT 
		CONCAT(RTRIM(Contact_Hd_Res.Forenames), ' ', RTRIM(Contact_Hd_Res.Surname)) AS [Debtor Name],
		REPLACE(CASE
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.BkSortCode != '' THEN
				DirectD_Dt.BkSortCode
			ELSE
				isnull(Contact_Hd_FS.BkSortCode, space(8))
		END, '-', '') AS [Debtor Sort Code],
		CASE
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.BankAcc != '' THEN
				RTRIM(DirectD_Dt.BankAcc)
			ELSE
				RTRIM(FundSrc_Hd.BankAcc)
		END AS [Debtor Account Number],
		RTRIM(Resident.Res_Code) AS [Collection Details],
		DirectD_Dt.Amount,
		CAST(DirectD_Dt.Amount AS NUMERIC(18, 2)) AS [Debtor Amount],
		CASE 
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '17' THEN '17 - Standard Ongoing Collection'
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '01' THEN '01 - First Collection'
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '18' THEN '18 - '
			WHEN DirectD_Dt.DDTranType = '19' THEN '19 - '
			ELSE DirectD_Dt.DDTranType
		END AS [Transaction Type],

		DirectD_Dt.DDHd_Ref,
		DirectD_Dt.DDDT_REF,
		DirectD_Dt.DUE_DATE
	FROM 
		DirectD_Dt (NOLOCK)
		JOIN DirectD_Hd (NOLOCK)
			ON DirectD_Hd.DDHd_Ref = DirectD_Dt.DDHd_Ref
			   AND DirectD_Hd.BatchNo
			   BETWEEN 0 AND 9999999999
		JOIN FundSrc_Hd (NOLOCK)
			LEFT JOIN Contact_Dt AS Contact_Dt_FS (NOLOCK)
				JOIN Contact_Hd AS Contact_Hd_FS (NOLOCK)
					ON Contact_Hd_FS.Contact_Ref = Contact_Dt_FS.Contact_Ref
				ON Contact_Dt_FS.Cnta_Det_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Bank_Det_Ref
			JOIN Resident (NOLOCK)
				JOIN Contact_Dt AS Contact_Dt_Res (NOLOCK)
					JOIN Contact_Hd AS Contact_Hd_Res (NOLOCK)
						ON Contact_Hd_Res.Contact_Ref = Contact_Dt_Res.Contact_Ref
					ON Contact_Dt_Res.Cnta_Det_Ref = Resident.Cnta_Det_Ref
				JOIN Room_Dt (NOLOCK)
					JOIN Locations (NOLOCK)
						JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
							ON Site.Site_Ref = Locations.Site_Ref
						ON Locations.Loc_Ref = Room_Dt.Loc_Ref
					ON Room_Dt.Room_Ref = Resident.Room_Ref
				ON Resident.Res_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Res_Ref
			ON FundSrc_Hd.FS_Ref = DirectD_Dt.FS_Ref
	WHERE 
		DirectD_Dt.Due_Date
		BETWEEN '17530101' AND '29991231'
		AND DirectD_Dt.Allocated != 'X'
		and DirectD_Dt.Submitted IS NULL
		and DirectD_Dt.DDTranType IN ( '01', '17', '18', '19' )
		AND Locations.Site_Ref = @{item().Site_ref}
)
SELECT 
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Name],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Sort Code],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Account Number],
	DirectDebitData.[Collection Details],
	SUM(DirectDebitData.[Debtor Amount]) AS [Debtor Amount],
	DirectDebitData.[Transaction Type]

	--,DirectDebitData.DUE_DATE
FROM
	DirectDebitData
--WHERE
--	DirectDebitData.[Collection Details] = 'MM0182'
GROUP BY
	DirectDebitData.DDHd_Ref,
	DirectDebitData.DUE_DATE,
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Name],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Sort Code],
	DirectDebitData.[Debtor Account Number],
	DirectDebitData.[Collection Details],
	DirectDebitData.[Transaction Type]

properties.description: Refreshes the GRG ACCOUNT data in TRANSFORM_DB

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [ACCNO]
      ,[ACCSUFFIX]
      ,[ACCTYPE]
      ,[ACCTYPE2]
      ,[ACCTYPE_DECODE]
      ,[ACC_REF]
      ,[AmendDateTime]
      ,[CALENDAR]
      ,[CAL_REF]
      ,[CHGPER]
      ,[Cnta_Det_Ref]
      ,[Cont_Ref]
      ,[CreateDateTime]
      ,[DAILYRATE]
      ,[ENDDATE]
      ,[FINALINV]
      ,[FS_REF]
      ,[FUNDSOURCE]
      ,[HOME_REF]
      ,[LASTRATEDT]
      ,[ORIGREF]
      ,[PENSBOOK]
      ,[PROFILE]
      ,[RATE]
      ,[RECGRP]
      ,[RECGRPDESC]
      ,[RELACCREF]
      ,[RES_REF]
      ,[RecType]
      ,[STARTDATE]
      ,[SUFFIXSUPERCEDED]
      ,[ANAL3]
      ,[ATTENTION]
      ,[AUTHORISED]
      ,[CONSULTANT]
      ,[CRCONTROL]
      ,[DEBTORCODE]
      ,[FUNDREQEDI]
      ,[FURC_DEC]
      ,[INPFUNDAPR]
      ,[LOCALITY]
      ,[NURFUNDAPR]
      ,[RECONCILED]
      ,'' AS [BANKACC]
      ,'' AS [BANKACCNAME]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS1]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS2]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS3]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS4]
      ,'' AS [BANKNAME]
      ,'' AS [BANKPOSTCODE]
      ,'' AS [BANKSORTCODE]
      ,[BANKSTREF]
      ,[BANKTRTYPE]
      ,[DDMANDREF]
      ,[SOCOLDAY]
      ,[SOCOLLECT]
      ,[SOVALUE]
      ,[USAGE]
      ,[CALCODE]
      ,[PCTDESC]
      ,[REVDATE]
  FROM [AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[ACCOUNT] AS A
   WHERE
	A.HOME_REF IN   (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')})
ORDER BY
	ACC_REF ASC

activities.name: Lookup HOME_REF
activities.description: Get all the HOME_REF values from Avery.Home

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT STRING_AGG(ColdHarbourHOME_REF, ',') AS HOME_REF_LIST FROM Avery.Home WHERE ColdHarbourHOME_REF IS NOT NULL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  
	[ACTDEATHDT]
	,[ADANAL_DEC]
	,[ADTYP_DEC]
	,[AD_REF]
	,[AmendDateTime]
	,[CAUSE]
	,[CAUSEDEATH]
	,[CreateDateTime]
	,[DATE]
	,[DISCHDECEAS]
	,[DISDEST]
	,[DISREASON]
	,[DISTYPE]
	,[DOCTOR]
	,[FINALDISCH]
	,[HOME_REF]
	,[INITIALADM]
	,[INOUT]
	,[LOC_REF]
	,[MOVE_REF]
	,[PLACE]
	,[REASON]
	,[RES_REF]
	,[ROOM]
	,[ROOM_TYPE]
	,[TIME]
	,[MOVE_TIME]
	,[ANALCHANGE]
	,[COMPOSITE]
	,[MOVESUB_REF]
	,[PREVDISDEST]
	,[PREVDISTYPE]
FROM 
	[AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[ADMIN_DISCHARGE] AS M
WHERE
	M.HOME_REF IN (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')})
ORDER BY 
	AD_REF ASC

properties.description: Copies the resident diary entries from CH to AH2 Transform

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	Resident_Dy.RES_DY_REF,
	Resident_Dy.RES_REF,
	R.RES_CODE,
    ChSysDec.Description AS EntryType,
    CAST(Resident_Dy.Entry_Date AS DATE) AS EntryDate,
	CAST(Resident_Dy.Review_Date AS DATE) AS ReviewDate,
    replace(cast(Resident_Dy.Entry_Text as varchar(MAX)), char(13) + char(10), ' ') AS DiaryEntry,
    isnull(User_Hd.Name, '') AS EnteredBy
FROM 
    Resident_Dy (NOLOCK)
    
    LEFT JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK)
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Resident_Dy.Entry_Type
        
    LEFT JOIN User_Hd (NOLOCK)
        ON User_Hd.User_Ref = Resident_Dy.User_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R (NOLOCK)
		ON R.RES_REF = Resident_Dy.RES_REF
